```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
## load data
UNpop <- read.csv("data/UNpop.csv")
UNpop
```

Aim: Calculate the percent increase in world population from 1950.
Base R
```{r}
## calculate ratio increase
UNpop$ratio <- UNpop$world.pop / UNpop$world.pop[1]

## convert into percentage
UNpop$percent_increase <- round((UNpop$ratio - 1) * 100, 1)
UNpop
```

tidyverse
```{r}
UNpop %>% # forward pipe operator
  mutate(ratio = world.pop / first(world.pop),
         percent_increase = round((ratio - 1) * 100, 1)) 
```
